VariableDescription.Name: Status__C4_PP_CIS
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         STSP Cluster>Solar Terrestrial Science Programme, Cluster
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     VALIDITY                        Validated - major caveats
#     VALIDATOR                       CIS Team at CESR
#     CAVEATS                         Insufficient CODIF counting statistics when density (H) < 5.0000e-03 (3221 times,                      
#                                      first at 2000-12-09T12:59:40Z)                                                                        
#                                     CODIF possibly saturated when density (H) > 2.0000e+00 (409 times, first at                            
#                                      2000-12-09T22:11:00Z)                                                                                 
#                                     Suspicious Proton Bulk Velocity (H) when abs. value > 2.0000e+03 (1 times, first                       
#                                      at 2000-12-09T14:11:47Z)                                                                              
#                                     Imprecise Proton Temperature para (H) when < 1.0000e+00 (8804 times, first at                          
#                                      2000-12-09T12:59:40Z)                                                                                 
#                                     Imprecise Proton Temperature perp (H) when < 1.0000e+00 (8484 times, first at                          
#                                      2000-12-09T12:59:52Z)                                                                                 
#                                     Preliminary Calibration Values.
#                                     Incorrect Temperature Values.
#                                     File Validated for Test Purposes Only.
#                                     HIA Switched-OFF on this s/c.
#     STATUS_KEY                      Status[0]= 0 = Bad data
#                                     Status[0]= 1 = Use with caution
#                                     Status[0]= 2 = OK
#                                     Status[0]= 255 = Not Supplied
#     SOURCE_NAME                     C4>Cluster spacecraft 4
#     DATA_TYPE                       PP>Prime Parameter
#     DESCRIPTOR                      CIS>Cluster Ion Spectrometry
#     DATA_VERSION                    01
#     TITLE                           Ion Moments>1 spin resolution
#     TEXT                            H. Reme et al, The Cluster Ion Spectrometry (CIS) Experiment
#                                     Space Sci. Rev., 79,  pp 303 - 350, 1997)
#     MODS                            Produced in accordance with CSDS file specification
#                                     Reference Document for CSDS CDF File Design, DS-QMW-TN-0003
#     ADID_REF                        ECLUCIS4
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 C4_PP_CIS_00000000_V01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  C4_PP_CIS
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Cluster Spacecraft 4, CIS Prime Parameters
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Cluster
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#     PI_NAME                         H. Reme
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  CESR
#     ACKNOWLEDGEMENT                 Refer to CSDS for rules of acknowledgement
#     GENERATED_BY                    Cluster French Data Centre, CNES Toulouse
#     GENERATION_DATE                 2001-01-09:08.14.33
#     INST_MODE                       C4>CIS>0>2000-12-09T12:53:40.384Z>CIS_NM1_CALIBR>Calibration mode
#                                     C4>CIS>112>2000-12-09T13:01:53.142Z>CIS_NM1_MAG-1>Magnetospheric-Mode-1
#     PARENTS                         RDM>001209_1_1A
#     RULES_OF_USE                    Refer to CSDS for rules of use
#     SKELETON_VERSION                CSDS_CDF_V2.00
#     INST_SETTINGS                   Parallel and perp. temperatures computed using FGM data>N
#     SOFTWARE_VERSION                V5.5 / DEC-00
#     VALIDATE                        Compatible with the ISTP CDF Standards
#     SC_ENG_ID                       FM8>?
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Plasma and Solar Wind
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Cluster
#     LINK_TEXT                       High resolution Cluster data from the
#     LINK_TITLE                      Cluster Science Archive
#     HTTP_LINK                       http://www.cosmos.esa.int/web/csa
#     SPASE_DATASETRESOURCEID         spase://VMO/NumericalData/Cluster-Tango/CIS/PrimeParameter/4S
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Interval centred time tag rounded to nearest msecond
#  2. CIS status
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 22:29:48 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#
EPOCH                                STATUS[0]              STATUS[1]              STATUS[2]              STATUS[3]
                                (@_Status[0]_)         (@_Status[1]_)         (@_Status[2]_)         (@_Status[3]_)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms                                                                                             
09-12-2000 12:53:40.384                      2                     15                      3                      1
